sub_title: Global Director of Product Marketing  | Marketing & Growth | SaaS Scale-Up | Ecommerce
summary:
Results-oriented marketing leader in B2B/B2C SaaS with expertise in marketing and communications leadership, strategy, product marketing, brand management, content, creative, and demand generation. 
Former co-founder, CMO, global product marketing director, and manager of marketing, brand, and content for startups, scale-ups, consultancy firms, and large, corporate organizations. Built and led global marketing teams for go-to-market, customer acquisition/retention, and digital marketing strategy and execution, driving growth, revenue, and profits while gaining a unique perspective on the impact of marketing across the entire customer lifecycle.

International Education:
. MBA from Nova & MIT Sloan Business Schools (Massachusetts Institute Technology), Boston, USA.
. Digital Transformation/Innovation Business Program from ISDI, Digital Business School, Madrid, Spain.
. Master Management and Strategic Marketing from Católica Lisbon School of Business & Economics.
. EU Citizen. Grew up, lived, studied, and worked in multiple countries across the EU, N.A., Asia, and Africa.
. Trilingual in English, Portuguese, and Spanish.

awards.title: "Best Wine Tourism 2012", issued by Alentejo Tourism
awards.description:
rhttp://www.poci-compete2020.pt/ProjetosPremiados/detalhe/13635-Esporao
REQUALIFICATION WINE TOURISM HERDADE DO ESPORÃO STATE ( premium)

Projeto: Requalificação do Enoturismo da Herdade do Esporão para oferta turística premium
Promotor: ESPORÃO - VENDAS E MARKETING, SA
Sistema de Incentivos: SI Inovação (Geral)
Investimento Elegível: € 2.477.024,09
Incentivo: € 1.114.660,84
2012 | Turismo do Alentejo - Prémio de “Melhor Enoturismo”

O Enoturismo da Herdade do Esporão, foi considerado o melhor projeto de enoturismo da região pelo Turismo do Alentejo. Num conceito que alia vinho e gastronomia, num cenário idílico e em contacto privilegiado com a natureza, a Herdade do Esporão é, desde o primeiro dia, um dos projetos de referência de enoturismo em Portugal.
Promovidos pelo Turismo do Alentejo, os Prémios visam distinguir a oferta turística da região alentejana. Esta edição premiou sete categorias, disputadas por 57 projetos: Melhor Prometo Público, Melhor Evento, Melhor Gastronomia, Melhor Animação Turística, Melhor Enoturismo, Melhor Turismo Rural e Melhor Empreendimento Turístico.
http://www.pofc.qren.pt/media/noticias/entity/enoturismo-da-herdade-do-esporao-renovado-e-com-nova-oferta?fromlist=1

profile_positions.description: Maximizing advertising revenue for the enterprise mobile-user-generated platform and app by leveraging data-driven strategies and innovative SaaS solutions, driving exponential growth through key initiatives.

profile_positions.description:
Collaborated with Beta-I on multiple projects since M.B.A. internship to date. Engaged with startups, corporations, government, and investors through Beta-I and independently, providing expertise, insights, and entrepreneurial experience. Recent initiatives:
▪ Soft launching YIP.com (a community-driven marketplace/SaaS startup)
▪ Developed the brand strategy for Hero.com (a B2C health-tech/SaaS startup)
▪ Defined the go-to-market plan for LEAP.com (a B2C Extreme Sports Social Network startup)
▪ Managed corporate open innovation initiatives, creating significant opportunities for startups, corporations, and governments (Notable programs: Deloitte Healthtech Accelerator and Fosung /China Healthtech Innovation Program).
profile_positions.title: Marketing Advisor and Entrepreneur in Residency | Innovation Consultancy & Accelerator

profile_positions.description:
ChannelEngine connects brands/retailers to +700 marketplaces, social commerce, and sales channels worldwide. In 2022 raised $50M to scale the SaaS platform.

▪ Developed product marketing strategies, processes, and tools driving growth by advancing key initiatives.
▪ Directed GTM strategies (i.e., market, customer, competitive analysis, positioning, segmentation, messaging, promotion): 
▪ Managed product marketing, content, creative, agencies, and freelance teams.
▪ Aligned roadmaps and initiatives across products, marketplaces, and stakeholders. 
▪ Deployed content mrkg strategy for thought leadership, awareness, and lead gen (i.e., growth funnel foundation, ICP& Personas, messaging framework, website, social, and advertising campaigns).
▪ Oversaw sales and partner enablement activities.
▪ Collaborated on targeted multichannel customer acquisition and retention programs globally. (i.e., demand gen, brand, lead gen, sales campaigns, Tier/ABM targeting), optimizing touchpoints like organic/paid PR, blogging, thought leadership, inbound content, PPC, events, sponsorships, webinars, targeted networking, and omnichannel approaches. 
▪ Managed OKRs and metrics, optimizing frameworks, processes, and tech tools and conducting data analysis and interpretation. Team exceeded 2022 € revenue and #acquired new customers targets.

profile_positions.location: HQ Google Tech Campus Madrid | London
profile_positions.description:
The platform that maximizes enterprise mobile-user-generated advertising revenue 

Defined and executed a strategic marketing roadmap driving enterprise sales growth, customer acquisition and growth, and market expansion. 
▪ Built the marketing & comms team/function from the ground up.
▪ Achieved a significant increase in customer base and record revenue growth (+160%/Y).
▪ Acquired high-profile customers like Real Madrid FC, Diageo, Heineken, Yamaha, Melia, and British Airways (avg. 30+/Y).
▪ Expanded business into 3 new geographies, boosting brand awareness (organic reach/+125%) and demand generation (paid reach/+70% inbound leads). 
▪ Collaborated on developing bespoke apps, leveraging user-generated content, data, and analytics.
▪ Effectively oversaw brand strategy, communications, PR, and digital marketing strategy execution.
profile_positions.title: Chief Marketing Officer  [SaaS Startup | Digital Advertising App | Top 50 Google Tech Startups]

profile_positions.location: Google Tech Campus, HQ Tech Hub Madrid and London
profile_positions.description:
The platform that maximizes enterprise mobile-user-generated advertising revenue. 

Drove end-to-end product lifecycle strategy alongside founder, tech, UX design, and sales. Developed comprehensive target and market analysis, identified problem-solution fit, defined USPs, crafted product vision, value proposition, and roadmap, and oversaw design and prototype development.
▪ Launched MVP, tracked product performance, user adoption, and feedback loops uncovering new use cases and benefits.
▪ Achieved product-market fit by driving initial organic validation and developing activation funnel from sign-up to paid plan (5% activation rate from first users/strong initial traction &predictability).
▪ Secured seed funding to establish a new market category (UGA) and lay the foundation for PLG's growth motion engine.
▪ Crafted the initial GTM strategy to reach €500k ARR and prepared for Series A funding in 2021.
profile_positions.title: Head of Product Marketing [SaaS Startup | Digital Advertising App | Top 50 Google Tech Startups]

profile_positions.description:
BlackShark is a leading innovative gaming tech company in the mobile gaming space.

Spearheaded a new category launch, implementing a high-growth GTM strategy with Sales leaders/peers, exceeding financial targets by +30%. Achieved #1 position in the gaming phone market/ Spain.
▪ Developed comprehensive EMEA marketing programs, adapting/activating a global GTM strategy
▪ Led cross-country teams to develop and execute marketing strategies, driving demand, increasing awareness, and generating exponential revenue growth
▪ Increased brand awareness and perception with a 2-year growth of +1200% in brand search volume, averaging 100 brand mentions per month, and a 4900% increase in social media engagement rate
▪ Achieved a 20% increase in online sales, with average annual website traffic and unique visits growth of 74.39%/above the industry average, and doubled the conversion rate to 3%
▪ Expanded the distribution network by 50%, establishing new retail partnerships and sales channels
▪ Launched a new mobile gaming phone brand and product - Series: Black Shark 2, Black Shark 2 Pro, Black Shark 3 5G, and Black Shark 3 Pro/5.  KR:1000% ROI/additional six-figure sales. Brand awareness: reach: 106.2M (approx. 23.7%/EU pop.),10M impressions. Media exposure: cumulative audience of 50M, 100 brand press mentions/m, 70 medium publications. Engaged: 26,000+ players, 2760+ teams, 300 tournaments, 883 Universities, and 14 countries
▪ Introduced the new Brand Identity "Game is Real." The brand investment paid off in lead Generation.KR: Unique Audience Reach:1.5M+/ Increase in lead volume: +68%/ Decrease in Cost Per Lead: +68%
▪ Formed strategic partnerships with high-profile gaming influencers, including Amazon University Esports, Prime Gamers, and Twitch Students, AliExpress-Asphalt eSports Series, Supercell-Clash Royale Gaming Tournaments, Tencent studios, etc 
▪ Managed the gaming fans' community across various social media channels/platforms
▪ Led brand and media relations
profile_positions.title: Regional Marketing Manager, EMEA |  Blackshark - Mobile Gaming Technology

profile_positions.description:
▪ Advised on brand leadership for key accounts (Philips, Procter & Gamble, Diageo) to drive market relevance, stakeholder engagement, and competitive advantage. Expertise spans brand strategy, positioning, awareness, reputation, identity, purpose, experience, design, communication, global alignment, portfolio mgmt., leadership best practices, employer branding, engagement, and strategic metrics for measuring brand value and returns.
▪ Directed PR, media relations, and campaigns for government tourist & investment boards of Macao, Czech Republic, Hungary, Israel, Tunisia, Cabo Verde, Dominican Republic, and Peru. Elevated tourism image, boosted visitor numbers, and arranged influential media and investor trips. Recognized with awards for outstanding outcomes and ROI in Czech Republic, Peru, and Tunisia campaigns demonstrating exceptional outcomes and ROI.

profile_positions.description:
Esporão SA is a leading premium wine, wine, beer, and olive oil multinational (62+ countries) 

Esporão SA is a leading premium wine, wine, beer, and olive oil multinational (62+ countries) 

Architected and launched the B2C business, transforming a deficit operation into a profitable industry leader. Oversaw a six-figure investment spanning marketing, technology, HR, and operations, turning a cost center into a revenue center. 135% 3-Y CAGR/B2C sales contributed 11% to the top line YoY.
▪ Built and led a high-performing team, growing it from 6 to 43 members. Tripled the nr of direct customers, with a strong focus on international markets (65% of customer base), effectively targeting high-value segments and increasing customer engagement by 30% within the first year.
▪ Defined/executed brand repositioning strategy, introducing an innovative approach from scratch that aligns business, product, brand, and behaviors positioning the EHE Brand as a thought leader in the industry. This strategic shift continues to profoundly impact the company's global projection. Earned multiple awards in Brand, Design, and Innovation and extensive Tier 1 media coverage.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager, Brand and Product

profile_positions.description:
Built/led a 60+ team in comms, PR, brand, content, creative, product mrkg, demand gen, and events/partnerships. Managed budgets, optimized acquisition, customer journeys, audience segmentation, and paid traffic. Executed strategies on key platforms, continuously optimizing ROI, CAC, LTV, CPC, and CPR. Crafted experiments for incremental demand across paid, earned, and owned channels.
▪ Launched Xbox 360/Microsoft in Iberia, surpassing PS3 sales by 40% (market dominance in a country for the 1st time).
▪ Drove award-winning multimedia projects with brands like Red Bull TV, Extreme TV Channel, SIC Radical/TV, Brand Images/TV, Metro Newspaper, FHM/Cosmopolitan Magazines, SAPO Search Engine/Classified platform, Procter & Gamble, Danone, Unilever, Xbox and Forza Motorsport 2, Reef, resulting in increased engagement, brand recognition, record-breaking viewership, and revenue.

Launched XL-SAPO.pt live streaming platform, achieving 300% audience growth and 1M subscribers in 6M. Implemented tier 1 brand marketing, driving +60k visitors through shoppable links (avg. 19% bounce rate/ 3-min avg. time on advertisers' site). Achieved 250% B2B ad revenue increase in 6 M, 65%/Tier1 clients.

Homeholidays.com Scaleup Outsourced Mrkg team: Achieved remarkable milestones, scaling to a successful exit. 
▪ Growth to Europe's Leading Vacation Rental Marketplace within 3 years, generating 500M in property owner bookings and featuring +40,000 listings, resulting in significant brand recognition among EU travelers, leading to acquisition by Homeaway.com (global leader).

volunteer_experiences.role: Educational and Cultural Volunteer  | Youth Mentor | Macau | Hong Kong and Lantau
volunteer_experiences.description:
While studying, I did Internships and volunteer work in Hong Kong, Macau, and Lamtau [China], promoting equal opportunities, personal development, and social reintegration by equipping young individuals with skills, knowledge, and experiences to help them lead productive lives upon release.
- Organized educational workshops on various subjects such as literature, art, music, and history.
- Provided tutoring and academic support to help youth improve their educational outcomes.
- Created a library or reading program to promote literacy and a love for reading among the youth.
- Collaborated with local community organizations or businesses to provide internships or job shadowing opportunities for youth nearing release.
